label: A4B3_oP28_55_ghi_egh-001
title: Minium-R (Pb$_{3}$O$_{4}$) Structure
comments: Pb$_{3}$O$_{4}$ has been observed in several structures (Wriedt, 1988; Dinnebier, 2003): \begin{itemize} \item Below 170K (Wriedt, 1988) it is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_oP28_55_ghi_egh-001}{orthorhombic Minium-R structure} (this structure).  (Gavarri, 1978) tracks this structure up to 240K. \item Above 170K it is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_tP28_135_gh_dh-002}{tetragonal Minium-T structure}. \item At ambient temperature the Minium-T structure transforms into what is apparently the Minium-R structure at a pressure between 0.11 and 0.3 GPa. (Dinnebier, 2003) call this {\em Phase II}. \item If the pressure is increased, between 5.54 and 6.6 GPa the structure transforms into orthorhombic \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_oP14_55_gh_ah-001}{Phase III structure}. \end{itemize}
